reviewText: Loved the movie. Thought I was getting a DVD though. Should have looked closer. I have shown it two two groups of students, helping them gain a greater appreciation for History.

thank you for your quick response, i really enjoyed this video , i love underwater filsm with boats and fish in them the treasure hunts are very exciting to see old things recovered and what they looked like , thanks again

I ordered this video because we visited the museum in Key West and wanted to know more about the discovery of the Atocha.  It is very informative, though old.  Would have been nice to get this on DVD instead of VHS
